column1: Y’know how we do little raydor things, what if we did like little flynn things, or little provvie things, or little tao things, etc. I think it’d be really cool if we made it a thing. So if you want prompts message me or send me prompts if you want to. xD
I don’t care who you send it for either. I wanna stretch my creative muscles!!!
1. themagicm said: "…the love songs really do make sense. All of them." Awww - such a cute and very Buzz to say something like this. The writers should contact you!!!

It felt like a Buzz thing to say so I kept it. AND THANK YOU!!! I just love these character so much and I want to do them justice. Sometimes I do wonder if the people on Major Crimes come on tumblr and see what we’re up to. If they do I hope they like what they see!

1. themagicm said: Well, they read our fics, so they might have a secret representation in our Tumblr fandom as well. There are so many interesting discussions here about the show and the characters. They could learn a lot from us.
WHAT!!! WHen did that start!! That is awesome! I love it!!! I’m flabbergasted!!!
I haven’t forgotten them you just stumped me anon so I’m still mulling them over. xD
